    Overview

    Aspiring job seeker with passion in all things related to data in the fields of big data and data analytics. I had obtained fundamental computing skills through my degree in Computer Science, and am eager to put it in good use. I also done various projects that can demonstrates my coding skill sets Java, Python, and C++. Most importantly, I am committed to my passion in information technology and maintained an inquisitive mind to learn new things.

    Awards

    High School Honor List mentioned (2012) The Society for Collegiate Leadership & Achievement Award Dean’s List (GPA 3.70 or above, four consecutive semesters 2016 - 2018) 2nd Best Senior Design Award, Computer Science division (2018)

    Work Experience

    Ecological Big Data Intern

    Big Ecological Data Archive Protocol, Center for Analytics and Data Science, Miami University, Jan 2018 - May 2018.

            worked with Miami University’s Ecological Big Data Initiative archiving three decades of data collected from a multitudes of lakes around the world.

            Compiled and formated accociated metadata and data for the Ecological Data initiative (EDI) archives (using EMLassemblyline, an R package library); see our archive data stored in the EDI’s portal.

            Formulated and documented a detailed protocol to enable other researchers within the university to easily archive their data in EDI’s repository (Beth, dickmaem@miamioh.edu, is my supervisor, in case you have further questions).

    Teaching Assistant, Object-Oriented Programming, Java

    Computer Science Department, Miami university, Jan 2017 - Feb 2017.

            Assisted course instructor in lab session to answer student’s questions

            Held help session to assist students with projects and assignments

            Evaluated student’s in-class projects and assignment

    English as a Second Language Instructor

    Changping, Dongguan, Guangdoing, China; OpenRoad English, May 2014 - September 2014

            Taught business and conversational English in reading, writing, and speaking.

            Wrote and designed English class materials used in business setting.

            Held various speaking sessions incorporating in-class games and fun activities.
